Uses of Package
com.polytech.di4.HelloAnt

  • Classes in com.polytech.di4.HelloAnt used by com.polytech.di4.HelloAnt 
    Class and Description
    AntGameObject
    This abstract class allows to instantiate any object needed by the game rules.
    Bot
    Represents a bot in the game server.
    BotDBCallback
    This interface is used by the Bot class to call back the database for certain operations on its data.
    BotGameInfo
    This class holds informations about the game a bot is currently playing.
    BotLoginException
    Represents an error that occurred during the login of a bot on the database side.
    BotMode
    The gaming mode of a bot.
    Cell
    This class represents a cell of a map.
    DBInterface
    DBInterface is the class that interfaces with the MySQL database.
    Game
    Game is the class that should be overloaded to create a new game type.
    GameManager 
    InvalidMapFormatException
    This class represents the exception for an invalid map format.
    Move 
    TCPClientCommunicator
    Creates a new TCP client.
    TCPClientHandler 
    TCPClientListener
    The client listener is responsible for accepting incoming TCP connections and creating, for each of those, a communicator that will enable the server to exchange with them.
